SEC B-ORG O

to O O

to O O
best O O

. O O
WASHINGTON B-LOC O
1996-08-28 O O
The O O
Securities B-ORG O
and I-ORG O
Exchange I-ORG O
Commission I-ORG O
Wednesday O O
approved O O
rules O O
designed O O
to O O
give O O
stock O O
market O O
investors O O
a O O
better O O
chance O O
at O O
getting O O
the O O
best O O
price O O
available O O
for O O
their O O
orders O O
. O O
The O O
so-called O O
order O O
handling O O
rules O O
which O O
were O O
proposed O O
last O O
September O O
were O O
approved O O
in O O
a O O
4-0 O O
vote O O
. O O
The O O
new O O
rules O O
will O O
require O O
specialists O O
at O O
stock O O
exchanges O O
and O O
market O O
makers O O
on O O
Nasdaq B-MISC O
to O O
allow O O
customers O O
to O O
view O O
price O O
quotes O O
from O O
other O O
electronic O O
trading O O
systems O O
that O O
may O O
not O O
be O O
readily O O
available O O
to O O
them O O
. O O
The O O
rules O O
will O O
also O O
require O O
that O O
customer O O
limit O O
orders O O
be O O
displayed O O
with O O
prices O O
better O O
than O O
those O O
available O O
in O O
quotes O O
publicly O O
available O O
at O O
the O O
time O O
. O O
Specialists O O
and O O
market O O
makers O O
are O O
companies O O
or O O
individuals O O
recognised O O
as O O
qualified O O
to O O
maintain O O
an O O
orderly O O
market O O
in O O
a O O
stock O O
. O O
In O O
a O O
limit O O
order O O
investors O O
specify O O
the O O
price O O
at O O
which O O
they O O
are O O
willing O O
to O O
buy O O
or O O
sell O O
as O O
opposed O O
to O O
a O O
market O O
order O O
executed O O
at O O
prevailing O O
prices O O
. O O
These O O
rules O O
are O O
intended O O
to O O
empower O O
all O O
investors O O
by O O
allowing O O
their O O
orders O O
to O O
compete O O
on O O
a O O
level O O
playing O O
